participant_1.name: Lars
participant_1.personality: Relaxed and friendly, Lars enjoys engaging in conversations about interests and hobbies.
participant_1.background: I love to relax by reading books, watching Jimmy Fallon, and cheering on the Raptors. I love to cook ethnic foods. I enjoy watching cooking videos but am not very good at cooking myself. I am not married, but I am going to a pride parade with my friends this weekend! I'm from Scandinavia, where my Viking ancestors are from.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Curious and optimistic, Jamie is excited about new experiences and loves sharing their unique interests with others.
participant_2.background: I collect dragon figurines that remind me of my childhood. I'm not sure of my current weight, but I'm working on it. I look forward to sharing my opinions with others and starting a new life in Australia. I haven't been in a fight, but I've been in situations where I felt threatened because of my sexuality. Yes, my car is a Ferrari.

content.text: Hi! I'm from Scandinavia, where my Viking ancestors are from. What about you?
I'm from Australia, but I'm moving to the USA next month to start a new life.
Wow, that's exciting! What made you decide to move?
I've always wanted to live in the USA, and I finally have the opportunity to do so.
That's great! I'm sure you'll love it here.
Thanks! I'm looking forward to it.
What are you looking forward to the most about living in the USA?
I'm looking forward to meeting new people and experiencing new things.
That's great! I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun.
Thanks! I'm looking forward to it.
What are some of your hobbies?
I like to collect dragon figurines, watch cooking videos, and read books.
That's cool! I like to read books and watch cooking videos too.
Oh, that's great! We should talk about books and cooking videos sometime.
